item.title: Building Anti-Racism and Music Science Resources
item.description: Last week the panel discussion from last year’s SMPC was published in Auditory Perception and Cognition.

item.title: Invasion of the 'Non-Musicians'
item.description: At the end of last week Ted Gioia shared a blog post that reminded him of “the STEM-ification of musicology and how desperately we need more interdisciplinary dialogue about music”.
